entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APICompat should compare against a framework if it finds an empty folder for that framework. #47925
  • Track the usage of the built-in SBOM generation via telemetry #47918
  • Hot reload extra slow for changes in Rider due to backup files with ~ suffix #47912
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.311] dotnet tool install command get access denied error if tools already installed #47906

Closed

  • PathUtilities misbehavior on linux #45631
  • Create documentation about trust boundaries of the .NET SDK and how to use it securely #45340
    10.0.1xx
  • "dotnet restore" fails if the project path contains a bracket #47832
  • publishing a web api (net 9) is not correct #45196
  • Very slow "dotnet restore" in 9.0.200 or higher version #47784
    Discussion
  • Verify DAC signing works in preview VMR branches #47842
  • Unable to find directory for jdk 11.0.24; please make sure the tool is installed on this image. #45834
  • Add a optional reason for the requires msbuild theory/fact attribute #44311
  • GlobalAnalyzerConfig broke with potential ordering change in .net 9 and no documentation tells you how to fix it #45150
  • SDK workloads installed by VS showing up in workload listing after installing the latest .NET 10 SDK build #47794
  • MAUI Templates are not visible in Visual Studio #45309

PullRequests

Created

  • Improves workaround for MacOS file watching quirks #47926
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update to the latest application insights #47924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move the attribute files into the correct folder #47923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fingerprint JS modules #47921
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [SBRP Usage Report] Add target pack support and scan project.assets.json files for package downloads #47916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Generate Link elements based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #47915
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • [StaticWebAssets] Backport perf fixes #47913
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Try to update queue to macOS 15 #47905
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: "Collection initialization can be simplified" #47886
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview3] Do not include symbols nupkgs in PSB archive #47919
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update breaking-change-guidelines.md #47797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update message for issues labeled as breaking-change #47812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update message for PRs labeled as breaking-change #47798
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not include symbols nupkgs in PSB archive #47887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create trust boundary doc Fixes #45340 #45666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Consolidate redist output paths #47767
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • FSharp assets should have vertical visibility in BP2 #47914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable TSA tools #47876
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview3] Fix missing files from rpm and deb packages #47911
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix missing files from rpm and deb packages #47910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix nullability warning in WebScenarioTests.cs #47907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust how we enable dac signing to get it working on VMR release branches #47875
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Remove nuget-client from non-SB VMR #47846
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • dotnet CLI: Rename project and command sub-folders #47800
    Area-CLI

Updated

  • realpath in c# #45637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't exclude *.app and *.dmg in .gitignore template #47867
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve Post-Build Signing Validation in the VMR #47744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Update .net10 p2 to p3 in the table #47724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Process C# directives in file-based programs #47702
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make all the properties in StaticWebAssetEndpoint lazy #47833
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Try NetCore-Public-Test #47773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Remove summary when failing, and double space #47872
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Simplify exit code logic for dotnet test (MTP) and consider no results correctly as "zero tests ran" #47874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use CDN Fixes #47503 #47712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move in-vertical manifest merging to new arcade package #47881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
